nodes.title: SWE Portfolio Page
nodes.prompt: Create me an SWE portfolio page
nodes.what: A personal portfolio page for showcasing software engineering projects and skills.
nodes.how: Organized into sections like About Me, Projects, Skills, and Contact.

children.title: Hero Section
children.prompt: Design the hero section for the portfolio page.

children.title: Contact Section
children.prompt: Provide a way to contact the portfolio owner.

nodes.title: Hero Section
nodes.prompt: Design the hero section for the portfolio page.
nodes.what: A visually striking hero section to introduce the portfolio.
nodes.how: Use a large background image, a headline, and a call-to-action button.

children.title: Call-to-Action Button
children.prompt: Design a call-to-action button for the hero section.

nodes.title: Projects Showcase
nodes.what: A section to display software engineering projects.
nodes.how: Use a grid layout with project cards.

children.title: Project Card
children.prompt: Design a project card to showcase individual projects.

children.title: Filter Bar
children.prompt: Add a filter bar to sort and filter projects.

nodes.title: Contact Section
nodes.prompt: Provide a way to contact the portfolio owner.
nodes.what: A contact section for users to reach out.
nodes.how: Include a contact form and social media links.

children.title: Contact Form
children.prompt: Design a contact form for the contact section.

children.title: Social Media Links
children.prompt: Add social media links to the contact section.

nodes.title: Call-to-Action Button
nodes.prompt: Design a call-to-action button for the hero section.
nodes.what: A button designed to encourage user interaction, such as signing up or learning more.
nodes.how: Use bold colors, clear text, and hover effects to make the button stand out.

nodes.title: Project Card
nodes.prompt: Design a project card to showcase individual projects.
nodes.what: A card layout to display project details like title, description, and image.
nodes.how: Include a project image, title, and a brief description in a visually appealing layout.

nodes.title: Filter Bar
nodes.prompt: Add a filter bar to sort and filter projects.
nodes.what: A UI element to allow users to filter and sort projects based on criteria.
nodes.how: Provide dropdowns, checkboxes, or input fields for filtering options.

nodes.title: Contact Form
nodes.prompt: Design a contact form for the contact section.
nodes.what: A form for users to submit their contact information and message.
nodes.how: Include fields for name, email, and message, along with a submit button.

nodes.title: Social Media Links
nodes.prompt: Add social media links to the contact section.
nodes.what: A grouping of social media link components within the contact section.
nodes.how: Organize links for platforms like LinkedIn, GitHub, and Twitter.

children.title: LinkedIn Link
children.prompt: Create a LinkedIn link with an icon and label.

children.title: GitHub Link
children.prompt: Create a GitHub link with an icon and label.

children.title: Twitter Link
children.prompt: Create a Twitter link with an icon and label.

nodes.title: LinkedIn Link
nodes.prompt: Create a LinkedIn link with an icon and label.
nodes.what: A LinkedIn link with an icon and label.
nodes.how: Use a LinkedIn logo icon alongside a text label styled for visibility.

nodes.title: GitHub Link
nodes.prompt: Create a GitHub link with an icon and label.
nodes.what: A GitHub link with an icon and label.
nodes.how: Use a GitHub logo icon alongside a text label styled for visibility.

nodes.title: Twitter Link
nodes.prompt: Create a Twitter link with an icon and label.
nodes.what: A Twitter link with an icon and label.
nodes.how: Use a Twitter logo icon alongside a text label styled for visibility.
